data.what_is:
MoEngage is an insights-led customer engagement platform trusted by over 1,200 global consumer brands such as Ally Financial, McAfee, 7-Eleven, Samsung, Flipkart, Domino's, Nestle, Deutsche Telekom, Airtel, and more. 

Digital-first and Enterprise brands from 35+ countries use MoEngage to power digital experiences for over 1.2 billion customers monthly and send 3.2 billion messages daily.

With offices in ten countries, MoEngage is backed by Goldman Sachs Asset Management, B Capital, Steadview Capital, Multiples Private Equity, Eight Roads, F-Prime Capital, Matrix Partners, Ventureast, and Helion Ventures.

* MoEngage was recognized as a Customers' Choice Vendor in the 2022 Gartner Peer Insights 'Voice of the Customer' for the Multichannel Marketing Hubs Report and a Strong Performer in the Forrester Wave(tm): Cross-Channel Marketing Hubs, Q1 2023 Evaluation.

* In their Winter 2023 Grid(r) Report, G2 has also recognized MoEngage as a leader in eight categories including Customer Journey Mapping, E-commerce Personalization, Marketing Automation, Analytics, Personalization, and Push Notifications.

***Product Description:

-> Omnichannel Engagement
Marketers and product owners can use MoEngage to act on collected insights and engage their customers across mobile and web push notifications, email, social media, messaging channels (such as WhatsApp), website banners, mobile in-app messages, and more. 

-> Customer, Journey, and Campaign Analytics
MoEngage empowers marketers and product owners to map their customers' journeys, gather insights into their behavior, preferences, and interests on web and mobile platforms, and view them in a single unified profile for each customer.

-> Advanced Segmentation and Personalization
Thanks to multiple layers of personalization (attributes, preferences, affinity, behavior, customer journey, and more), marketers and product owners can send relevant communications and build memorable experiences that help retain customers for longer.

-> Accurate Predictions
With proprietary AI and ML algorithms, MoEngage can predict the next steps a customer will take, what the right time is to send them marketing communication, and what the best channel of communication should be for maximum ROI.

-> Unified Messaging Infrastructure for Multichannel Transactional Alerts
MoEngage Inform is an advanced notification infrastructure designed for time-sensitive communications. With its API-first approach, you can create and deliver notifications across multiple channels using a single API. MoEngage Inform simplifies your communication processes, ensuring timely and efficient delivery of crucial messages.
data.product_description: With MoEngage, companies can orchestrate campaigns across channels like push, email, in-app messaging, web push and sms, with auto-optimization towards higher conversions powered by machine learning.Insights-led EngagementUnlike other automation and analytics platforms which restrict marketers to being campaign-centric, MoEngage empowers marketers and product owners to bring back the CUSTOMER in customer engagement.Transactional Messaging APIMoEngage also offers a proprietary built-in infrastructure that Engineers and Software Architects can implement to send transactional messages in real-time, seamlessly integrate new communication channels, and centralize logs and reports into one dashboard.Push Notification DeliveryMoEngage's patented technology, Push AmplificationTM, offers best-in-class push notification delivery rates, increasing mobile reachability by up to 40%.Tech Integrations and PartnersMoEngage offers a rich tech partner ecosystem, with over 200 integrations with your existing Analytics, Attribution, CDP, CRM, Data Warehouse, E-commerce, Advertising, CPaaS, Survey, Loyalty, Wallet, ESP, BSP, and more platforms!Regional Experts and Local SupportMoEngage houses a world-class team of in-house product experts and industry consultants in multiple countries that offer strategic inputs and regular business reviews.

pricing_plans.plan_description:
1. Behavioral Segmentation- Create segments based on user interactions across all touchpoints.

2. Cross-Channel Engagement- Communicate through SMS, Push Notifications, In-app messages, Emails, App-Inbox, and On-site messages.

3. Campaign Analytics - Analyze reach, open rates, CTRs, and conversions of your campaigns.

4. Connectors- Engage users outside your site or appConnect, and export data to platforms such as Facebook, Google, WhatsApp, and more. Trigger ads, and messages to make these channels a seamless part of your omni-channel strategy.

5. Frequency Capping, Throttling, and DND - Avoid spamming your users. Cap global limits on messages, set do-not-disturb rules, and throttle delivery speed.

6. Self-serve Knowledge BaseExtensive documentation to support your growth journey.

7. API AccessData, and transactional APIs.

8. Email Support

pricing_plans.plan_price:
Get in Touch for Pricing
Everything in the Starter Plan +
pricing_plans.plan_description:
1. Smart Triggers- Automatically trigger personalized messages based on user interactions.

2. A/B, and Multivariate Testing.

3. Geo-fencing - Personalizes communication based on your user's location.

4. Dynamic Recommendation Platform - Use our APIs to sync your content library to send personalized recommendations.

5. Flows -  Cross-channel Journey BuilderCreate cohesive cross-channel campaigns using an easy-to-use journey builder.

6. Sherpa- AI-based Time, and Content OptimizationMachine learning algorithms that auto-optimizes the message variant, and the delivery time for higher conversions.

7. Push Amplification+ - Proprietary technology from MoEngage to increase push notification delivery rates by up-to 25%.

8. User Imports - Import user actions, attributes, and behaviours from other systems, and segments.

9. Real-time Device Triggers, and Exit Intent Push Notifications- Trigger notifications instantly based on a user interaction, even when the user is not on your app or site.

10. LocalizationCreate sub segments based on location, language, and target them in a single campaign.

11. Named Account Manager

12. Email, and Push Delivery Advisory - Get expert guidance from the MoEngage team, and improve your domain reputation, email deliverability,, and push delivery rates.

13. Consulting Services, and Quarterly Business Reviews

pricing_plans.plan_price:
Get in Touch for Pricing
Everything in the Growth Plan +
pricing_plans.plan_description:
1. Teams - Create multiple teams in the same account, with access control of campaigns managed by different business groups.

2. Campaign Approval Workflows - Setup a maker-checker approach to review campaigns before publishing.

3. Single Sign-on, and Two-factor Authentication- Secure your user data with two-factor authentication, and let your teams access MoEngage dashboard with single sign-on. 

4. Dynamic Product Messaging.

initial_reviews.review_title: I am using Moengage day in and day out as a part of Growth team. I do data and campaign analysis.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
- Data Analysis is very easy.
- Support is superb.
- New feature request are delivered pretty fast.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
- There are a lot of issues related to In-App campaigns which needs to resolved at product level on priority as it is the most useful channel for my business.
- Flutter support can be improved.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
More relevant communication: MoEngage helps us understand your behavior and preferences. This allows them to send  messages and promotions that are more likely to interest you, instead of generic blasts.

Improved customer experience: By understanding user journey, we can anticipate our needs and provide a smoother experience. This could mean things like receiving helpful tips at the right time or getting personalized recommendations.

Reduced marketing clutter: MoEngage helps us target you with the right message at the right time through the right channel. This can lead to less overall marketing communication, making it less intrusive for you.

initial_reviews.review_title: MoE Review - AstraPay (April 2024)
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
Every week, there is always a weekly review where the MoE Account Executive (AE) conveys features that can be optimized to increase AstraPay's user engagement. Additionally, every quarter, they also hold a QBR Review, which is very informative and insightful as they share about our performance/achievements during a certain period and provide recommendations or insights that can be beneficial to improving our performance or achieving KPIs. Furthermore, the AE is very responsive and easy to reach, which is very helpful if we experience any issues in operating MoE as we use MoEngage in daily basis.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
So far, everything is all good. There's nothing to dislike.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
- Optimization of analytics feature utilization (time efficiency in conducting analytics, such as user behavior analysis, CRM channel utilization, user path analysis, funnel analysis, etc.).
- Easy coordination and prompt response if any development is required to enhance the utilization of MoE features.

initial_reviews.review_title: Very powerful, lots underneath the hood.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
It is an incredibly powerful CRM tool, allowing power users to create very customized user flows and automations.

Their account management team is superb -- incredibly responsive and very dedicated to helping their clients succeed.

Their product and tech team do a great job of soliciting customer feedback and incorporating that feedback quickly onto the platform. I am really impressed with how quickly they can add new enhancements.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
It's designed for power users so offers a lot of flexibility and customizations along a large number of dimensions. This brings with ith a pretty steep learning curve. However, it's absolutely worth spending the time to get to know its functionality, because you'll get a lot of ROI for your time.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
MoEngage is a great platform that helps us target and automate campaigns.

initial_reviews.review_title: Moengage's contribution to digital marketing revolution
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
MoEngage is great since it makes it easier for me to understand customers. It does an excellent job of gathering all the data I have and producing insightful analysis then i can utilise those insights to craft experiences that each user feels unique about.
It's quite convenient to be able to categorise customers according to their preferences and behaviour with that i can design ads campaigns that effectively target each demographic.
Overall MoEngage is a useful tool for any marketer looking to create a sense of specialness and loyalty in their clients.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
Despite the fact that MoEngage is designed to provide campaign optimisation and AI-driven insights.
I've discovered that the AI falls short of expectations. It should use more accuracy and customisation upgrades to really live up to its claims.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
MoEngage is really stepping up to take on the issues of digital marketing. It functions similarly to a complete solution for organising campaigns, tracking performance, and engaging customers. It is simple to maintain consistent brand experience across all platforms when we have all these resources in one location. Also the data analysis is excellent and provides me with useful insights into what customer wants.

initial_reviews.review_title: Personalized experiences, In-depth analysis, ease of use
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
Moenagage provides in-depth analytics on user's behaviour in the app which helps us improve our campaigns & our product overall. For eg: Using Behaviour & funnel analytics on Moengage, we were able to identify that our clients prefer to analyse a stock before placing their orders, which made us change our order placement journey from direct redirection to now routing the user via the company analysis(Quotes) page.

Moengage also allows hyper-personalisation by use of various user attributes  which enhances the customer's experience on the app.

Also the customer support is usually pretty quick at helping us with our issues/queries.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
The AI tools being provided do not seem to be well trained yet, and sometimes throw random responses, this could be improved.

There are issues related to certain channels like In-app which is an important channel for us.

Flutter support must be improved upon.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
Multi-channel marketing: Reach customers across various channels like email, push notifications, SMS, in-app messages, and social media all from a single platform.

Customer segmentation: Group customers based on demographics, behavior, and interests to tailor messaging for better relevance.

Customer journey mapping: Visualize the entire customer journey across different touchpoints to understand how customers interact with your brand.

initial_reviews.review_title: Nightmare experience with Moengage
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
I think for the price they offer, their push notification, messaging segmentation & automation and analytics tools are solid. They don't have an amazing admin user experience in terms of setting up flows to support re-engagement and retention, and this has a cost associated with it in terms of learning the tools and inefficiencies with setting things up quick and easily, but it is a solid tool that allows you to do a lot at a competitive price point.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
I have had maybe the worst experience with Moengage that I've ever had as a customer during my 6 years running my business, to the point that I've lodged a formal complaint with the consumer watchdog in my country for what appears to be a breach of consumer and corporate law on their part. In my opinion Moengage unfortunately is one of those bad faith companies that make it extremely difficult to cancel your contract with them. But in a way that is way beyond the usual practices you can experience with subscription software. Not only do they not provide a way for you to cancel your subscription through their platform, they ignored 4 separate written attempts I made over 6 months to cancel our subscription repeatedly. This was when our business was experiencing financial difficulties and yet they continued to charge us money and refused to cancel the subscription in clear breach of their own terms of service. They ignored more than 10 emails I sent giving notice to terminate the contract, treated me with contempt when they did respond once and then went back to ignoring my emails, and then continued charging us thousands of dollars a quarter for a service we no longer wanted to use or were using. I tried changing our company bank details to prevent them from continuing to charge us and then they just used the old bank account details they had on file for us to continue to charge us money. It honestly is shocking to me that an established company with good reviews online has been this awful to deal with. I'm at a point where I'm disputing the charges with our bank and trying to block them from charging us in future via my bank, while they continue to completely ignore my cancellation attempts. To reiterate - we are totally within our rights to cancel the contract - there is nothing in there about fixed terms, and we gave more than the 30 days required notice. Keep in mind this is for a standard subscription contract that we are legally entitled to cancel by emailing them. So as one business owner to another, I advise you please do not to go with these guys and just pay a bit more for a reputable service that doesn't treat their customers this way. At a point when my business was struggling, it's been a kick in the pants that is just so avoidable if they would treat their customers as human beings and with the normal respect afforded to people. It honestly feels criminal to me at this point and has taken up hours of my time trying to resolve something that should be simple and straightforward. Bottom line - save yourself the trouble and please go with another provider.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
We needed an affordable system to send out automated push notifications for our mobile app product and also automated drip campaign emails that have a level of personalization when onboarding new users and re-engaging existing users. We used Moengage also to analyse the effectiveness of our re-engagement comms, both email and mobile push notifcations, and did some A/B testing of different types of messages.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about MoEngage?
review_question_answers.answer: I think for the price they offer, their push notification, messaging segmentation & automation and analytics tools are solid. They don't have an amazing admin user experience in terms of setting up flows to support re-engagement and retention, and this has a cost associated with it in terms of learning the tools and inefficiencies with setting things up quick and easily, but it is a solid tool that allows you to do a lot at a competitive price point.

initial_reviews.review_title: Excellent tool to set-up and scale-up, rule-based communication infrastructure
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
Ease of use, Cover all important channels - Whatsapp, SMS, Email, RCS, Call center.
It has ready to use plug-play APIs, which seamlessly integrate with almost all the systems.
Strong customer support which resolves issues in a short span of time.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
Multiple integrations required in SDK to enable various features on the app.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
MoEngage helped us improve conversions in our digital journeys.
We were able to win back the drop-off customers by mapping the journey exit points, curating multi-channel retargeting strategies over different communication channels.
Apart from journey drop-off management, we have integrated MoEngage with our internal systems to send triggered-based automated transactional communication.

there are many, rich text notifications, the ability to do multi-channel campaigns, and ready 3rd party connectors for various seamless data flows. It's a platform with ease of designing the customer multichannel communication flows with the use of best decisioning features integrated.
Due to nature of business and product offering we run campaigns on daily basis to our target segments.
Customer support is also good and problem resolution TAT is improved.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
Would like to see stand alone landing pages / microsite creation feature. It will assist to reduce tech team intervention and will fasten the campaign TAT.

MoEngage customer engagement platform assisted us to reach our customers with dynamic and personalized offers in Realtime. It also assisted us to understand our customers digital behavior.
With analytics we are able to improve cross sell offering and implemented better collection strategies.

initial_reviews.review_title: My favourite platform for sending all communications seamlessly and tracking data
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
The best thing I have liked about MoEngage is the ability to set up very very complex flows involving multiple iterations and check, time delays, conditional splits etc. Moreover, the Intelligent Optimiser feature has often helped me set up A/B tests without having a clear idea of how to categorise a user as a test group or control group user. Some of the service providers that we use for SMS, WAP and Email have a native integration with MoEngage, which further simplifies our problem of tracking data points related to performance of communication campaigns. Their support team is also very active once we reach out to them clearly with screenshots.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
I use MoEngage everyday and have seen that the challenges that I have faced with MoEngage are very trivial. One such use-case where I felt that MoEngage could do better was that it has no UI for setting up chatbot flows for WhatsApp. Similarly, there is no option of integrating IVR campaign data with WhatsApp and SMS in flows.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our company's entire outbound communication flow is served through MoEngage, be it bulk-reachout to prospective customers or engaging our existing customers. Even generation of campaign reports, identifying target segments, analysing product feature data -- everything is done by our team on MoEngage.

Their support team is also very active once we reach out to them clearly with screenshots.

all_reviews.review_title: I am using Moengage day in and day out as a part of Growth team. I do data and campaign analysis.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
- Data Analysis is very easy.
- Support is superb.
- New feature request are delivered pretty fast.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
- There are a lot of issues related to In-App campaigns which needs to resolved at product level on priority as it is the most useful channel for my business.
- Flutter support can be improved.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
More relevant communication: MoEngage helps us understand your behavior and preferences. This allows them to send  messages and promotions that are more likely to interest you, instead of generic blasts.

Improved customer experience: By understanding user journey, we can anticipate our needs and provide a smoother experience. This could mean things like receiving helpful tips at the right time or getting personalized recommendations.

Reduced marketing clutter: MoEngage helps us target you with the right message at the right time through the right channel. This can lead to less overall marketing communication, making it less intrusive for you.

all_reviews.review_title: MoE Review - AstraPay (April 2024)
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
Every week, there is always a weekly review where the MoE Account Executive (AE) conveys features that can be optimized to increase AstraPay's user engagement. Additionally, every quarter, they also hold a QBR Review, which is very informative and insightful as they share about our performance/achievements during a certain period and provide recommendations or insights that can be beneficial to improving our performance or achieving KPIs. Furthermore, the AE is very responsive and easy to reach, which is very helpful if we experience any issues in operating MoE as we use MoEngage in daily basis.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
So far, everything is all good. There's nothing to dislike.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
- Optimization of analytics feature utilization (time efficiency in conducting analytics, such as user behavior analysis, CRM channel utilization, user path analysis, funnel analysis, etc.).
- Easy coordination and prompt response if any development is required to enhance the utilization of MoE features.

all_reviews.review_title: Very powerful, lots underneath the hood.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
It is an incredibly powerful CRM tool, allowing power users to create very customized user flows and automations.

Their account management team is superb -- incredibly responsive and very dedicated to helping their clients succeed.

Their product and tech team do a great job of soliciting customer feedback and incorporating that feedback quickly onto the platform. I am really impressed with how quickly they can add new enhancements.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
It's designed for power users so offers a lot of flexibility and customizations along a large number of dimensions. This brings with ith a pretty steep learning curve. However, it's absolutely worth spending the time to get to know its functionality, because you'll get a lot of ROI for your time.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
MoEngage is a great platform that helps us target and automate campaigns.

all_reviews.review_title: Moengage's contribution to digital marketing revolution
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
MoEngage is great since it makes it easier for me to understand customers. It does an excellent job of gathering all the data I have and producing insightful analysis then i can utilise those insights to craft experiences that each user feels unique about.
It's quite convenient to be able to categorise customers according to their preferences and behaviour with that i can design ads campaigns that effectively target each demographic.
Overall MoEngage is a useful tool for any marketer looking to create a sense of specialness and loyalty in their clients.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
Despite the fact that MoEngage is designed to provide campaign optimisation and AI-driven insights.
I've discovered that the AI falls short of expectations. It should use more accuracy and customisation upgrades to really live up to its claims.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
MoEngage is really stepping up to take on the issues of digital marketing. It functions similarly to a complete solution for organising campaigns, tracking performance, and engaging customers. It is simple to maintain consistent brand experience across all platforms when we have all these resources in one location. Also the data analysis is excellent and provides me with useful insights into what customer wants.

all_reviews.review_title: Personalized experiences, In-depth analysis, ease of use
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
Moenagage provides in-depth analytics on user's behaviour in the app which helps us improve our campaigns & our product overall. For eg: Using Behaviour & funnel analytics on Moengage, we were able to identify that our clients prefer to analyse a stock before placing their orders, which made us change our order placement journey from direct redirection to now routing the user via the company analysis(Quotes) page.

Moengage also allows hyper-personalisation by use of various user attributes  which enhances the customer's experience on the app.

Also the customer support is usually pretty quick at helping us with our issues/queries.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
The AI tools being provided do not seem to be well trained yet, and sometimes throw random responses, this could be improved.

There are issues related to certain channels like In-app which is an important channel for us.

Flutter support must be improved upon.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
Multi-channel marketing: Reach customers across various channels like email, push notifications, SMS, in-app messages, and social media all from a single platform.

Customer segmentation: Group customers based on demographics, behavior, and interests to tailor messaging for better relevance.

Customer journey mapping: Visualize the entire customer journey across different touchpoints to understand how customers interact with your brand.

all_reviews.review_title: Nightmare experience with Moengage
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
I think for the price they offer, their push notification, messaging segmentation & automation and analytics tools are solid. They don't have an amazing admin user experience in terms of setting up flows to support re-engagement and retention, and this has a cost associated with it in terms of learning the tools and inefficiencies with setting things up quick and easily, but it is a solid tool that allows you to do a lot at a competitive price point.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
I have had maybe the worst experience with Moengage that I've ever had as a customer during my 6 years running my business, to the point that I've lodged a formal complaint with the consumer watchdog in my country for what appears to be a breach of consumer and corporate law on their part. In my opinion Moengage unfortunately is one of those bad faith companies that make it extremely difficult to cancel your contract with them. But in a way that is way beyond the usual practices you can experience with subscription software. Not only do they not provide a way for you to cancel your subscription through their platform, they ignored 4 separate written attempts I made over 6 months to cancel our subscription repeatedly. This was when our business was experiencing financial difficulties and yet they continued to charge us money and refused to cancel the subscription in clear breach of their own terms of service. They ignored more than 10 emails I sent giving notice to terminate the contract, treated me with contempt when they did respond once and then went back to ignoring my emails, and then continued charging us thousands of dollars a quarter for a service we no longer wanted to use or were using. I tried changing our company bank details to prevent them from continuing to charge us and then they just used the old bank account details they had on file for us to continue to charge us money. It honestly is shocking to me that an established company with good reviews online has been this awful to deal with. I'm at a point where I'm disputing the charges with our bank and trying to block them from charging us in future via my bank, while they continue to completely ignore my cancellation attempts. To reiterate - we are totally within our rights to cancel the contract - there is nothing in there about fixed terms, and we gave more than the 30 days required notice. Keep in mind this is for a standard subscription contract that we are legally entitled to cancel by emailing them. So as one business owner to another, I advise you please do not to go with these guys and just pay a bit more for a reputable service that doesn't treat their customers this way. At a point when my business was struggling, it's been a kick in the pants that is just so avoidable if they would treat their customers as human beings and with the normal respect afforded to people. It honestly feels criminal to me at this point and has taken up hours of my time trying to resolve something that should be simple and straightforward. Bottom line - save yourself the trouble and please go with another provider.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
We needed an affordable system to send out automated push notifications for our mobile app product and also automated drip campaign emails that have a level of personalization when onboarding new users and re-engaging existing users. We used Moengage also to analyse the effectiveness of our re-engagement comms, both email and mobile push notifcations, and did some A/B testing of different types of messages.

review_question_answers.answer: I think for the price they offer, their push notification, messaging segmentation & automation and analytics tools are solid. They don't have an amazing admin user experience in terms of setting up flows to support re-engagement and retention, and this has a cost associated with it in terms of learning the tools and inefficiencies with setting things up quick and easily, but it is a solid tool that allows you to do a lot at a competitive price point.

all_reviews.review_title: Excellent tool to set-up and scale-up, rule-based communication infrastructure
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
Ease of use, Cover all important channels - Whatsapp, SMS, Email, RCS, Call center.
It has ready to use plug-play APIs, which seamlessly integrate with almost all the systems.
Strong customer support which resolves issues in a short span of time.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
Multiple integrations required in SDK to enable various features on the app.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
MoEngage helped us improve conversions in our digital journeys.
We were able to win back the drop-off customers by mapping the journey exit points, curating multi-channel retargeting strategies over different communication channels.
Apart from journey drop-off management, we have integrated MoEngage with our internal systems to send triggered-based automated transactional communication.

all_reviews.review_title: My favourite platform for sending all communications seamlessly and tracking data
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
The best thing I have liked about MoEngage is the ability to set up very very complex flows involving multiple iterations and check, time delays, conditional splits etc. Moreover, the Intelligent Optimiser feature has often helped me set up A/B tests without having a clear idea of how to categorise a user as a test group or control group user. Some of the service providers that we use for SMS, WAP and Email have a native integration with MoEngage, which further simplifies our problem of tracking data points related to performance of communication campaigns. Their support team is also very active once we reach out to them clearly with screenshots.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
I use MoEngage everyday and have seen that the challenges that I have faced with MoEngage are very trivial. One such use-case where I felt that MoEngage could do better was that it has no UI for setting up chatbot flows for WhatsApp. Similarly, there is no option of integrating IVR campaign data with WhatsApp and SMS in flows.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our company's entire outbound communication flow is served through MoEngage, be it bulk-reachout to prospective customers or engaging our existing customers. Even generation of campaign reports, identifying target segments, analysing product feature data -- everything is done by our team on MoEngage.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
MoEngage is an excellent vendor that provides top-notch mobile engagement solutions. Their platform is intuitive and easy to use, and  Mr. Fandra Syafriga from customer support team is always available to assist with any questions or concerns.

What sets MoEngage apart from other vendors is their ability to personalize and tailor the mobile experience to each individual user. Their AI-powered engine allows for targeted messaging and real-time insights, leading to increased user engagement and retention.

Overall, I highly recommend MoEngage for any business looking to improve their mobile engagement strategy. They are a reliable and innovative vendor that truly delivers on their promises.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
None at the moment. I'm very happy with MoEngage.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
MoEngage is solving a variety of problems related to mobile engagement, including:

Lack of Personalization: With their AI-powered engine, MoEngage can analyze user behavior in real-time, allowing businesses to send personalized and relevant messages to each user.

Low User Engagement: MoEngage helps businesses increase user engagement by providing targeted messaging, real-time insights, and customized experiences for each user.

Difficulty Retaining Users: By analyzing user behavior and preferences, MoEngage can help businesses retain users by sending relevant messages and offers, reducing churn and increasing customer lifetime value.

Overall, MoEngage's platform provides businesses with the tools and insights they need to improve their mobile engagement strategy, leading to increased user engagement, retention, and revenue.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
- User Friendly
- Ease for someone new to learn very quickly
- Features like Multiple Templates, Flows, Segmentation, Scheduling in multiple ways, etc
- Keeps updating the features & options as per the market standards
- Keeps getting feedback from customer POV

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
- Might need a small interaction or session with their clients/customer whenever they launch any new feature/options, so that they can be well aware of how they can use it in their business or operations
- Need a chat support in order to ask any queries immediately & sort it at the earliest, than email support, as you know in this days, people seek for immediate resolution rather that waiting for a longer time.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
- Reaching our customers on promotional / educational / awareness activities
- Engaging with our customers on a Day-to-Day basis
- Ease of operations has reduced our efforts & time in scheduling any push notification

all_reviews.review_title: Incredible CRM tool for boosting user engagement and Business metrics.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
I use Moengage to validate various hypotheses behind user re-engagement campaigns and AB tests. We can create multiple inbound and outbound campaigns and leverage Facebook and Google audiences. I love how they let us strategically use sticky campaigns which garner maximum engagement without hampering user experience.
Analyzing user paths, user behaviour, personas, engagement and session time via interactive graphs is very easy with Moengage.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
We use specific Key-Value pairs while creating a campaign, and sometimes, when using content_id or campaign_id, the redirection logic is not as expected. Also, when using multiple variants of images in any campaign using Sherpa, the delivery gets delayed and affects the timing of the following notification.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
I use MoEngage primarily to gauge how users interact with changes in imagery when being nudged through in-app and push notifications. MoEngage has helped us improve our engagement and retention numbers which we monitor through analyze>> behaviour>> funnels>> retention feature. Duplicating existing campaigns or sending auto-triggered notifications basis user device, location, and app activity are highly relevant use cases in our case. We have also created customised dashboards for each team to monitor their numbers, like daily orders, user sessions, uninstalls, etc., on MoEngage.

all_reviews.review_title: Efficient Support and Feature-Rich Platform: MoEngage is a Game Changer
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
MoEngage has been a game changer for our marketing and customer engagement efforts. One of the things that I like the best about MoEngage is its exceptional support team. They are always available and quick to respond, helping us overcome any obstacles that we may face.

The platform provides various features, from push notifications to email marketing, which helps us reach our customers through multiple channels. The push templates are excellent - they are easy to use and allow us to create personalised, eye-catching messages that grab our customers' attention.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
One of the few things that I dislike about MoEngage is that we rarely encounter any bugs or glitches. However, in the rare instance when we do face an issue, the support team is quick to identify and resolve it.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
MoEngage solves many problems related to customer engagement and retention. By providing personalisation, multi-channel communication, automated campaigns, and real-time insights, MoEngage allows businesses to deliver more personalised and relevant customer experiences, leading to increased customer satisfaction and loyalty.

all_reviews.review_title: MoEngage has great service
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
The team is incredibly responsive and quick to address any concerns or questions you have. Their account management team is proactive and provides valuable insights to help you achieve your marketing goals. Overall, I highly recommend MoEngage for their exceptional service.

In addition to their excellent customer support and account management, I find thier UI to be intuitive and user-friendly. The platform is well-organized, making it easy for the user to navigate and find what they need.

They present data and analytics in a visually appealing way, which makes it easier for user to interpret and take action. The platform's customizable dashboards and reporting features also enable you to track key performance indicators and monitor campaign performance effectively.

Overall, MoEngage's UI is designed with the user in mind, making it easy to use and visually appealing.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
None at the moment. I am happy at the moment

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
MoEngage is primarily solving the business problem of customer engagement and retention. In today's competitive ladscape, businesses need to find ways to keep their customers engaged and satisfied to retain them in the long run. They offer various features that enables us to create personalized experienec for our customers.

all_reviews.review_title: Amazing software for engaging existing user base and increasing app open rate.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
The customer support team at MoEngage is terrific because their account managers immediately solve all the queries and concerns on raising a support ticket.
Secondly, with the immense support of their tech team, with the addition of a few key-value pairs, we have created a highly customised process of notification automation based on user behaviour.
We use MoEngage to create custom user segments based on their activity on the app or upload email IDs, phone numbers etc. and target them via their preferred channels. Session and Source is also an excellent feature that lets us analyse the average session duration per user and the ad platform from which the user landed on our app. This is a perfect way to identify high-value ad platforms.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
When we use Notification Id in the key-value pairs, that particular notification gets tagged at the end of the notification tray and has a meagre conversion rate. Although sherpa and push amp plus helps in delivering the best notification variant to users, it causes a significant delay in notification delivery.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
We switched from Clevertap to MoEngage a while ago and have been super pleased with the ease of creating push notification campaigns and full-funnel analytics.
Before scheduling any push notification campaign, we use multiple variants of image, text, optimisation event, and key-value pairs. We use sherpa and push amp plus to send the best-performing variant to the maximum user base.
Creating/duplicating/stopping instant push notifications or scheduling a push notification campaign is very easy, even for beginners.
It lets us analyse user behaviour, funnels and retention metrics in real-time through interactive pie charts, line graphs or bar graphs.  RFM analysis further helps us predict how new users differ from repeat users and how these new users can be nudged into repeat customers.

all_reviews.review_title: Best Cost Efficient User Engagement Tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
It is a platform that we are using for customer onboarding as well as customer retention. Because with MoEngage you get all the different communication channels from SMS to WhatsApp to IVR Callings. Apart from that, you have a proper analytics setup which helps you to understand the user journey on your platform and then work on the strategy of targeting them.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
The only thing I dislike or complain about is that it has a lot of data discrepancies and also it takes days to load the data passed by events which do not help our or anyone's business. The support team is always clueless regarding this kind of issue.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
With MoEngage, we have started reaching our customers with various offers or when we are launching any new product via SMS, Push Notifications, WhatsApp, IVR, AND Email. And we have increased our user retention along with increasing our sales revenue. There is a lot more to achieve with this tool.

all_reviews.review_title: Good Platform for runtime data Visibility
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
The way the mo engage integrates the events from our app and tracks the live runtime event-level activity data is really really impressive. Infact we use google firebase also for tracking the similar level of data for visualizing and verifying what is happening in the business. We use both tools (MoEngage and Firebase) for cross-validation of our business metrics/events across platforms.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
Even though the tool was great, we felt there are few issues with the tool which didnot solve our purpose greatly.

1)  They claim, the tool captures data at runtime but we have over a period of time observed lag of data which usually takes around a week's time to normalize. Which is causing a lot of damage to our business

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
MoEngage is a good tool consisting solutiong for Consumer Analytics. A lot of event level(most granular level of data capturing can be automated and stores for visualizations and analysis purpose)

2) Querying can be done without writing the queries but just by applying some filters on the data. What is really appreciate is the great inbuild functionality that is available in the tool.

3) Last but not least, Their  AI-driven personalization is a great tool to schedule campaigns for our business and it automatically picks the active user base and send it over all the campaigns scheduled.

all_reviews.review_title: Efficient and insightful Marketing automation and user Engagement software.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
1. MoEngage is an incredible option that helps us boost user retention and re-engagement by sending push and in-app notifications. It helps us nudge dormant users with highly targeted and personalized notifications.
2. User journey and behavior analysis through highly interactive and vibrant charts and graphs help us identify useful user patterns and activity across various features.
3. Campaign creation is pretty effortless, we can create as many variants to test as we want. Analyzing the performance of all the variants is very easy too. Notification text and even Background color can be customized and no stringent rules for Image dimensions.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
1. Various numbers like impressions delivered, daily uninstalls and other important down-the-funnel events seem to be disproportionately high when compared to actual numbers. Not a very reliant tool for data analysis.
2. While analyzing user paths, funnels, behavior or any other analysis which includes custom events, and attributes, MoEngage takes an awful lot of time to load data.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
1. Our team uses MoEngage to schedule various types of daily notifications for users.
2. I think the most wonderful and less talked about feature is the ease of use from mobile devices too, this has come really handy in critical situations, highly commendable efficiency from the web too.
3. I frequently use their analyze feature which lets me analyze user behavior, funnel, retention, session duration and source of users, uninstalls etc.
4. User path analysis is highly critical for maintaining retention of our product and the interactive visualization and drop-off at each step offered by MoEngage in vibrant color theme is a wonderful job done.

all_reviews.review_title: Customer engagement and app analytics in a single package
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
After a user has been onboarded on our app, we use MoEngage to enter these users into onboarding flows, direct them to event-triggered user journeys and send them personalized notifications based on their behavior or interaction with the app and a few blanket notifications. The user interface is clean and tidy, professional color theme, self-explanatory process to create dashboards, funnels and campaigns.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
Sometimes we see a major delay in getting the call back of delivery status which results in delays in the sending time of notification and hence affects the next notifications too.
While doing AB testing between variants, we should be provided an option that if one variant is performing better than the other, then all impressions of the best performing variant would be served, right now even with Sherpa this feature is lacking.
Importing users and then creating a custom segment is a very long process, this too with a limit on the users that can be imported at once.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
MoEngage has provided us a platform with which we can reach out to our users, educate them about important use cases of the product they are missing on, increase our feature adoption, and run experimentation around the success/failure of various features through in-app surveys and event usage.
The campaign creation flow is very smooth, we can target/exclude by choosing from various user attributes, behavior, event triggers etc.
Retention and uninstall mapped to session count and source help us in eliminating poor-performing campaigns, not only on the notification front but on acquisition channels too.
Geofencing is a very important feature that lets us send geographically segmented and personalized notifications(using locale and custom user attribute in text) to our users.

The user interface is clean and tidy, professional color theme, self-explanatory process to create dashboards, funnels and campaigns.

Importing users and then creating a custom segment is a very long process, this too with a limit on the users that can be imported at once.

all_reviews.review_title: Best user engagement & analytics platform in the market
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
1. Tool is simple & straightforward. Creating events & funnel is easy as it's just a one-time user education.
2.Provides end-to-end analysis of user journey & behaviour with graphs & reports.
3. Pushing of personalised & in-app notifications helped us to retain the inactive users.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
1. It takes a lot of time to display the data; often there is a delay is the callback response.
2. Sometimes, there is a mismatch in the data when we compare the numbers with MoEngage to the DB & console data.
3. Storage time of attribute data is very less & can't do the cohort analysis with old users.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
Scheduling of push/in-app notifications along with user walk tour which was done manually before is now being automated. Reduced a lot of effort & increased user retention.

all_reviews.review_title: MoEngage is the best way to engage your users!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
I like the fact that I can create customised user journeys to target users at multiple parts of the funnel. The targetted PNs can be customised to contain a variety of personalised traits.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
At times certain parts of the platform could have self-filled parameter names; I have to copy and paste the exact field name to get it correctly. It would be much easier if they had a drop-down to choose from.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
MoEngage is solving the problem of targetting users via campaigns the product company sets up. The movements can be of various types, and multiple threshold settings are present to ensure users aren't getting bombarded. It benefits me by allowing me to target users to come back to specific features by sending reminders of what they can do next.

all_reviews.review_title: Incredible Customer Engagement Platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
It is super easy to set up Push Notification Campaigns on MoEngage that even a beginner can do without any formal training and the analysis of campaign performance is also pretty straightforward. I have been loving MoEngage as it helps us reach out to the right cohorts with the right communication. It also helps us segment users based on their behavior on the app like watch time, the number of content viewed etc. Sessions and source data help us in finding out the most efficient sources that contribute to the highest session times.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
We always struggle with the discrepancy in numbers as there is almost a 40-50% discrepancy between the numbers reported on our backend and that on the MoEngage dashboard.

Recommendations to others considering MoEngage:
MoEngage can be a great choice that would help in augmenting quality metrics and bring down user drop-offs.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use MoEngage to create smooth user workflows, decide on events for triggering automated notifications and cap the total notifications that get sent to every user. Geo-Fencing helps us in sending vernacular notifications to users belonging to different states and the analytics and the campaign performance can be easily established from the Dashboard. We also experiment with sticky notifications every once in a while and this results in significant bumps in DAU.

all_reviews.review_title: Highly Efficient Customer Engagement platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
The best part is the ease of managing Email newsletters, Push Notifications, in-app notifications and SMS campaigns from one place. Scheduling email and SMS campaigns have helped reduce ad hoc tasks. We can easily create different user flows to enhance user activity on our App and monitor the performance of test and control cohorts through Custom dashboards.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
We upload user data and create custom segments and cohorts very frequently and MoEngage does not allow the addition of multiple custom cohorts in a single campaign therefore duplicating this campaign and changing custom cohorts becomes hectic.

Recommendations to others considering MoEngage:
MoEngage is AI-driven and can help Apps to grow their userbase without losing out on an important customer base. Engaging existing customers is more critical than acquisition as it helps in improving conversion rates and MoEngage helps in doing so.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use MoEngage to smartly and precisely target users based on their last touch points. AB testing on every step of various flows helps us better cater to our audience by identifying the content and communication they respond to. We use MoEngage to create meaningful user journeys and optimise conversion rates on each step.

all_reviews.review_title: Decent CRM Marketing Tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
MoEngage is a CRM tool that is easy to use. It also has an intuitive UI that makes it easy to navigate and understand, especially for someone who is not in the marketing field.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
The functionalities of MoEngage can be quite limiting compared to several other tools out there such as NetCore. In my opinion, they also don't have the greatest onboarding team as we struggled with integrating to MoEngage for the longest time due to not having the full picture of everything that was required.

Recommendations to others considering MoEngage:
If you need a good CRM Marketing tool to help with your marketing automation, I would recommend MoEngage. However, just be wary regarding the onboarding process and make sure you have your team working closely with MoEngage. Otherwise, you may realise that you would be needing to continuously do integration work to reap the full benefit of the tool.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are trying to build a complete user engagement journey using Email in MoEngage. This will allow us to onboard our customers seamlessly along with giving us the capabilities to retarget and resurrect customers that may have dropped off at the various touchpoints we have.

all_reviews.review_title: Truly amazing user engagement platform.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
1. Easy creation of user flows like network flow or engagement flow or onboarding flow.
2. Ease if negating certain user segments, attributes and flows from active campaigns.
3. Testing the look and feel of scheduled notification in a test device.
4.  It s super useful for detailed product analysis, such as user-level behaviour, custom event tracking, and creating custom dashboards for visibility.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
1. Uninstall level data is not correct.
2. Not possible to send gifs or videos in notifications.
3. They only store user attribute data for 2 months, therefore very difficult to do old user segmentation, before two months.

Recommendations to others considering MoEngage:
It is a great tool that helps in automating marketing journeys, via auto-triggered and scheduled push notifications. An amazing tool to have, if you do not want to miss out on keeping your existing userbase engaged.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use MoEngage to create user journeys and segments as this increase the scope of personalisation while sending notifications or emails. It helps us in setting up an engagement-focused notification journey for users. It also enabled us to identify the best-performing customer segments and we were able to cross-leverage this data for other marketing campaigns. It has helped us improve on our app stickiness as we were able to reengage our users more efficiently.

all_reviews.review_title: Instrumental tool for enhancing user engagement.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
We set up Event-triggered notifications from Moenagge itself which were initially being set up by the backend team.  Bringing wireframes and onboarding journeys to life is so easy and convenient with MoEngage, the process is so smooth and friction-free that even a beginner can do it.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
While uploading/importing user data for creating custom segments, we are required to do so in chunks as the system can not handle huge data at once. Also, there is a huge discrepancy between the numbers reported on the MoEngage dashboard and our backend.

Recommendations to others considering MoEngage:
MoEngage is an amazing platform that helps in increasing engagement with the app and also nudges users to perform certain in-app activities which increases feature usability too. Must try it because it is also the most reasonable one.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
As someone who looks into retention and acquisition, I use MoEngage daily to chalk out user journeys and personalise notifications for various user personas. We also make dashboards for viewing daily campaign performance and better visualization of various AB tests. I create dashboards with the user attributes/properties which are super helpful in understanding user behaviour and app stickiness.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
It took us nearly 3 months for the complete integration of MoEngage and they did not waive off subscription charges for this duration and only gave us a grace period of 4 weeks. The response time of their support team is usually 48 hours so important things might get blocked because of this.

Recommendations to others considering MoEngage:
MoEngage is the perfect CRM Tool and the best in price range among its competitors. A must-have tool for marketing automation and user reengagement.

MoEngage offers the perfect solution for user re-engagement through the means of Push notifications, Bulk SMS to identified cohorts and emailers for dormant users. It aids the easy and code-free creation of user journeys and event-based mapping and user segmentation

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
I have encountered that notification delivery rates dip along with the CTRs when the audience pool is larger which means essentially we are reaching out to a slightly higher volume of users at significantly higher prices.

Recommendations to others considering MoEngage:
MoEngage is a great CRM tool and reasonable than others, definitely go for it.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use MoEngage mainly to set up campaigns for sending blanket as well as promotional push notifications. It helps us drive effective growth and also help us to nudge users to perform certain core in-app events which are important for the Business.

all_reviews.review_title: The best marketing tool ever used
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
The customer service part is the best with MoEngage apart from the product in itself. It has some of the best features that are very important for a marketer. Push amp plus which increases the deliverability for Xiaomi OEM (is one of the largest mobile OEM in India) does help increase the reach by a significant percentage.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
We wish MoEngage was competitive in pricing. Compared to other players in the market MoEngage is expensive. But if all the exclusive features are made use of then it's still worth the money.

Recommendations to others considering MoEngage:
If internal marketing channels (Push Notifications and emails) are considered as your key marketing channels to get traffic and to increase retention, then MoEngage for sure gives all the required options to deliver, perform and achieve the desired results.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
Because of the easiness in using the tool it has saved time for the execution team. Also, the features MoEngage offers are resulting in better performance (In terms of CTR and deliverability) and also reduce execution error.

all_reviews.review_title: Great and affordable CRM tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
MoEngage helps us in real-time analytics, user property and attribute segmentation. Using this segmentation and geo-targeting option, we can send them personalized notifications which have great CTRs. We can create default custom segments like users of one particular geo-location or users performing certain events and perform certain formulas on them and thus run push notifications which give us better results than running vanilla blanket notifications.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
The base number of notifications always seems to be increasing but the clicks from notifications never increase, I can not understand the issue here.

Recommendations to others considering MoEngage:
Definitely worth exploring, they gave us good discounts while onboarding and the tech support during integration was amazing.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use MoEngage to drive user engagement and revive cart abandoners or users who are in the last steps of their journey. With the help of MoEngage, we can segment users and devise cohorts based on their behavior. Using Recency, frequency, Monetary analysis we identify our power users and send them targeted and super personalized notifications.

all_reviews.review_title: Great CRM tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
The dashboard is intuitive and fairly simple to use. Creating campaigns takes minutes and analyzing user cohorts through the means of behavior, funnel, retention. It also helps us analyze acquisition sources. MoEngage offers user-level analytics, and also we can put a filter on user attributes like city, country, activity on app among others.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
Notifications delivered are sometimes higher than the number of devices we see on the backend.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use MoEngage for web and app push notifications. It has helped us prevent user churn and also boosts our user retention. Campaign set up and analytics is easy and the custom dashboards depict clear performance of any split tests or other experiments that are being run.

all_reviews.review_title: Automation Tool for All USER ENGAGEMENT Requirements
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
Ability to provide detailed analysis of user's activity on the app. In our case, it is basically to analyze what were the best watched videos, their duration, days/hourly split, which category, etc.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
There isn't a single thing that I think of that MoEngage doesn't have when it comes to user engagement. They have a Push Notification service, Email Automation service, and in-depth analysis.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
With MoEngage, we are keeping our users engaged in every part of their mobile app journey in such a way that users are able to make use of our app in the best possible way. Benefits that we have observed are 1) Users are making good use of the app. 2) We manually don't have to sit and do it. We can plan and schedule each and every aspect either with the help of a Flow, smart trigger, or general push notification.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
-	We are still waiting for some functions: content api (push notification); sending push at the best time (best time for each person)
-	System sometimes works unstable.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
-	System sometimes works unstable, such as:
+ I set each user will receive 1 event-triggered push/ day, but somebody still receive more than 1
+ In 1 triggered push, I set the Minimum delay between two messages is 4 days, but just after 1 day, user can receive the same message.
+ Little bit complex integration with other tools.

all_reviews.review_title: Amazing analytics and tracking tool for businesses
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
I like Moengage Customer Engagement Platform for creating neat and clean workflow for my SMS campaigns as well it is very good in sending real-time SMS campaigns through its API events. We have created multiple API events for our Order Management System and we have mapped it for sending real-time SMS to the customers based on transactions. Apart from this, it is also good for doing analysis of your SMS campaigns that how many SMS we have sent out and how many customers have responded. Now we are sending any SMS files to any other vendor for sending out all our SMS campaigns. Moengage Customer Engagement Platform has solved our issue for sending out all our SMS campaigns which include batch and real-time SMS campaigns for order management system. We are also able to send location based SMS offer if customer making any transaction on our instores. I advice it to other digital marketers for sending out all our SMS campaigns with smooth and effective way.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
-It requires to source data from various CRM and third party vendors and needs connectors to connect to them.
-Storage of data is at third party public cloud which can lead to data security issues for any organization.
-It help automates the way content is published and allows to manage all social media profiles.
-I dislike the connectors as when customers use some other third-party apps and when I need to send some notification via them, it becomes quite difficult while using this platform
-hence result of this we miss the notification sometimes. hence I dislike this feature.

Recommendations to others considering MoEngage:
Ease of Use and a simplified UI. Specific tabs/groups as per the requirement of the firm. A/B testing ease with seamless campaign creation via duplicating the existing variation. One click non-personalized fallback template creation reduces the time to create the campaign. Segmented targeting basis affinity/engagement and various attributes. API integration is effective and seamless. Analytics provide a complete picture of the campaign/retention and engagement thereby assisting the decision making process. In a nutshell this tool handles every aspect of CRM and is a must have tool.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
The best thing that I like about this platform is the push email notification, every time when I just need to send them important emails as information I just have to click once and this platform sends the email that I saved as a template. I love this feature. Apart from this feature, I like support services as well. I have been handling organic engagement activities. This includes planning, designing and execution of engagement notifications. Through Moengage's analytical insights, I can easily focus more on scaling my campaigns. This has eventually reduced my time which I usually spend planning the engagement activities. The ready to use reporting structure is even amazing. Makes things easier for MIS Team.

all_reviews.review_title: Moenage - performance review
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
The analytics panel enables us to get good insights of the current notifications program that we run, with segmented results and behavioral flows. It also gives a detailed view of the funnel analysis for overall frequency and unique users.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
The detailed reports sometimes take a while to get over the mail.
Also we do not have the option to take only selected columns, we get all the columns everytime we fetch a report. Sorting with time option is also not available.
Api integrations are a big problem as they dont allow some of the user journey related notifications

Recommendations to others considering MoEngage:
Moenage as a platform provides excellent ease for setting up some journey notifications, some trigger-based notifications, and manual notifications.
Analytics also helps us to keep track of the performance of the notifications that we are scheduling

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
The delivery % of the notifications increased after using moenage, also the segment selection became quite easier and analysis of the notifications being sent was easier to view.
Moenage also enables us to take actions on different segments of the users like dormant, users who have not interacted with the app for certain days etc.

all_reviews.review_title: All-in-One tools for CRM needs
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
Overall experience with MoEngage is good. It's an all-in-one tool for CRM needs, we can migrate from previous platform to MoEngage with better price and capability.
1. Very user-friendly dashboard interface.
2. Marketing automation feature brings the best CVR compare to all our channels.
3. MoEngage available to send campaigns on multiple platforms/device all in one go.
4. Reporting dashboard structure is very well designed, easy to understand for first time users.
5. Custom subscription packages really help to find the best plan for brand to use based on needs.
6. Best support from their Customer Success Manager that guide us to activate and optimize the platform for better performances.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
Initial integration was very challenging and a bit complex for us, but was solved with good communication between Fabelio Tech team and the MoEngage support staff. There was some issues where MoEngage unable to send campaigns to our users on shopping sale season, we a bit loss moment at the time. Need to fix all the bugs for better user experiences and improve loading speed on reporting and segmentation sections.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
Costumer's journey on the purchase path is essential on e-commerce; Mo Engage helps us reach every touchpoint on the website start from landing page to conversion.
CRM platform is critical to interact with potential users for conversion and existing customers for up-selling or cross-selling; Mo Engage helps us to reach the audiences at the right time with the right messages.

all_reviews.review_title: MoEngage is really easy to use and helpful
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
Overall, MoEngage is easy to use, even as a beginner. The help center page is also beneficial, and you can see most of common problems there, so no need to ask to your customer's success.
MoEngage also has Academy where you can learn more about the platform from the expert.
Their predictive segment are really helpful and can help us determine which segment that we should focus on, MoEngage also help us by giving some general insight about what type of campaign we need to use for specific segment also explaining how we should engage with them.
Most of general segment that usualy used at CRM are already available in thier platform.
MoEngage also provided almost in all channels that usualy use to engage with the customer.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
I think it will be good if they have a feature where we can schedule the same campaign depends on the date or day, so for the repetitive campaign no need to be created every week or every time we want to push the campaign.
Their data point is too short, I think it's better at least we can see data point from a quarter or 90 days before.

Recommendations to others considering MoEngage:
It is one of the best platforms that you can use

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
MoEngage helps us to target broader and specific customers and also by customer journey.
With a specific and personalized campaign, we can target the right customers, so they feel more beneficial by using our Apps.
MoEngage also has a lot of choices to use when we want to connect or engage with our customers

The team has been very supportive and they do take feedback positively regarding the product, they also try to understand a lot of special use cases, and usually the team as a solution in place, if not they would let you know, if they would build a solution for the use case or not.
I would endorse MoEngage as a Customer Engagement platform to any B2C organisation.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
There is nothing to dislike about the MoEngage as a product or support. However, there is a lot of room for improvement for the product to improvise and add a lot of value.

all_reviews.review_title: Great mobile engagement platform with premium support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
Platform's robustness and amount of features. MoEngage allows us to leverage our mobile strategy by having tons of behavioural data and analysis. It also has a very complete communication suite. We're currently using it only for our apps but we have already seen major results. I do need to point out the quality of support. When we were looking for a platform like this, we read dozens of reviews and ratings about customer support. MoEngage outperformed top platforms in this sense. We decided to go with it because we knew that having a good onboarding and support along the way was critical for success. We have a dedicated customer success manager that has been helping us on a weekly basis from the beggining.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
Nothing in particular. The onboarding process was fabulous, and the support staff as well. The only thing I'd point out, if I had to pick one negative thing, would be that billing is only in dollars or euros, which for South American company is not perfect. Still, this is standard on the market and was not a surprise.

Recommendations to others considering MoEngage:
Of course, compare it to other platforms to see what best meets your requirements. But I'd give it a try since it's one of the most complete mobile engagement platforms available on the market,

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're mostly trying to improve engagement and retention on our mobile platform. For this to be accomplished, we need deep insights from data and a powerful communication channel. This has been possible with MoEngage. From day one we saw clear ways to make our app communication better and started collecting positive results (better conversion rates and retention) just a few months later.

all_reviews.review_title: MoEngage is our strong partner for growth
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
MoEngage is a powerful tool to manage your company's growth by understanding more about your customer journey and how they interacted with our app. It has a very user-friendly dashboard; where you can see all the key metrics, your topline, as well as all the current & scheduled campaigns. MoEngage also has predictive segments (RFM), where you can see the current users' behavior within the app and engage with those users. This powerful tool provides additional information on our user's segments; who are our loyal users and how many are about to churn.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
Onboarding MoEngage for the first time was a bit of a challenging times especially for us who have never used this tool previously. This can be improved by providing all the needed information prior to integration ahead of time, as this integration involves not only Marketing but also other respective teams (Product, Growth, Tech).

Recommendations to others considering MoEngage:
If you are looking for a tool to help you manage & run multiple campaigns for multiple platforms, MoEngage is your answer. It has all the features you need to run Push Notifications, Emails, In-App, even SMS/WhatsApp! Make sure to prepare everything prior to integration to onboard MoEngage. Once you're well adapted to this platform, running segmented campaigns are easy. You can even create multiple campaigns for multiple platforms at the same time. Modifying campaigns are also easy; just duplicate, edit, adjust, and publish it. The dashboard and analytics are very user-friendly, with easy to digest analytics.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
Campaigns attribution and user segmentation

all_reviews.review_content:
