1. Custom Segmentation & Personalization - Using MoEngage's customer segment, I can collate and analyze customer data. This helped me and my team curate and personalize the user experience by matching the customer demand to the available property.
2. User Paths - We love MoEngage's User Path Analysis in the form of purchase path and uninstall path analysis to understand steps taken by a user before making a purchase and the pattern of users who uninstall the app respectively.
3. One dashboard for analytics and engagement - We can use the data insights and engage with our customers across channels such as push notification, email, and in-app push.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
Nothing as of now. We are seeing huge improvements in the engagement rate (60% Boost) after onboarding MoEngage.

Recommendations to others considering MoEngage:
Go ahead, Moenage will be your good choice as mine.

Increase conversions by offering more personalized communication
Grow user engagement by connecting all engagement channels
Boost DAUs/MAUs by improving user engagement

Sometime there is slight delay in the when tracked an event, but it manageable. There is also some delay when upload a custom segment, duplicate a campaign. But overall it is worth with the wait.

Moengage behavior in real time !!!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
Moengage provides companies with the analysis of the behavior of each customer, to understand them in a better way to retain them and delight them with the right information. You can establish personalized communication with each client on the web, on your mobile and by email. Its interface is simple and allows you to navigate without problems, it is easy to configure, we must also highlight the easy way to create campaigns thanks to the A / B tests that you can perform before and thus not have problems of duplicating the existing variation . You save time and give your entire team work fluency.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
Our experience has been very good reaching objectives in a very short time, however the templates provided by the platform seem limited to us, they should provide a greater number of templates to have better performance and productivity. It is not a bad platform but it could be better.

Recommendations to others considering MoEngage:
Any company can use moengage, you will have the ability to understand your customers and through marketing campaigns send the appropriate information to keep them interested in your products or services. You will also be able to have a greater reach of clients, save time and give your team work fluidity. The tools and functions are easy to use, in a short time you will know what their use is. Its interface is fully navigable since it is very organized and you will not have any problem with its functionality, we recommend it.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
We mainly use moengage to attract and retain our clients and users in general. The tools and functions they provide us are comprehensive and easy to use. We have achieved goals set in a short time and significant increases in sales thanks to the scope that we now generate with the creation of marketing campaigns. We must highlight the moengage customer service team, who are always willing to help solve any questions or problems so that you have the best quality of service. Previously we implemented other more expensive software but the truth is that the performance, productivity and efficiency that we obtain with moengage is unmatched, it is above many. We are happy with the results.

With "flows feature", we create several flows with dozens of campaigns block with different trigger conditions to map customer journey to keep them active with different channels - sms, email, push, facebook retargeting ads. Also, we can use endless A/B/C test and personalization attributes in the flow which is so powerful.

Plus, Moenage has a very responsible and professional customer success team. I will show my appreciation to my account manager -Harikishore again. Harikishore, my friend, you really help me a lot and also I learned so many new campaign ideas from you.

The loading speed can be improved but it is not a  big problem

We tried to find a Complete CRM and Multiple channel marketing automation solutions. Moenage solved all the problems we have.

all_reviews.review_title: Using the tool for the past 2 years
all_reviews.review_content:

Ease of setting up push campaigns and flexibility in running queries. With the flows feature, I'm able to build on the entire user journey and make necessary corrections in campaigns whenever necessary.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
Complexity in creating segments in in-apps & SMS. Visualizations in funnels can be done better.  Issues/Queries needs to be handled in a more systematic manner with more transparency and updates on the issue raised. It would be great if Moengage could share an ETA for resolving issues.

all_reviews.review_title: Perfect Tool For All APP Engagement Needs!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
MoEngage platform is an all-inclusive App Engagement tool. We have been using it for over 2 years now.

The platform has advanced options for customer journeys on the app, in addition to General Push, In-App Notifications,  it has Smart Triggers, Flows, Real-Time Triggers, all you would need to engage your customers on your app. From Acquisition to On-boarding, from Engagement to Retention, they have tools for each step of a customer lifecycle on any app. The platform is multi communication mode capable, where notifications, emails & SMS can be sent to the subscriber from a single integrated platform.

MoEngage is progressive, they keep adding new features & enhancing the current features to be in line with the current industry trends.

Recently, the platform introduced analytics & predictive segments. These advanced data analytics tools help in quick campaign performance analysis. The predictive segment functionality is a great introduction through which we can create proactive retention campaigns basis predictions.

Also, MoEngage has a great customer success team, the team engages on a regular basis with platform updates & campaigns performance reviews. Team also guides on how to make better use of the platform & what are the best practices in the Industry.

In all MoEnagage is a great tool for all your CRM needs, it's a complete solution for communication & analytics.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
However, the platform has really come a long way with lot of great helpful features getting added every quarter, there are few things which can be added like options to bold the text, change colour, highlight text, carousel based notifications, video notifications, etc.

The team has shown us the roadmap & a lot of these missing features are going to be launched in the next couple of months.

Rest all looks great.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are using MoEngage for Engagement of customers on our OTT app. We use the same for subscriber onboarding, engagement & retention on the app.

The tool have helped us to engage subscribers on our app, we have seen 4 fold jump in our usage numbers.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
Love how easy Moengage do targeting and personalize our costumer. The dashboard also quite help marketers doing marketing automation seamlessly. We also can understand user journey better when we using Moengage.

Another features that will be a good help for us digital marketers  are variations of marketing automation campaign that we can create easily without involving tech team. There are several campaign I used regularly such as smart trigger push notification and email marketing.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
Overall we haven't found any feature in Moengage that we dislike yet, only several feature like custom dashboard need a little improvement and they already working  on the improvement earnestly.

Recommendations to others considering MoEngage:
If you are a growth officer that want to understand deeply your user's behavior  better than anyone, this tools is the right one to used. Its worth the cost!

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
With Segmentation feature, I can understand better what users want when they using our apps by seeing their detailed journey inside Treya app.

With campaign feature, I can target specific users with several type of campaign and create multiple content. I also can do A/B test easily when creating marketing automation campaign such as push notification, email marketing, and in-app native without budging out tech guy.

With flow campaign feature, I can a seamless combined campaign between push notification and email marketing to match our costumer's journey. This kind of campaign really help my team learning about the behavior of each users

all_reviews.review_title: How MoEngage helps Sociolla to reach SOCO app users
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
Great tech, engineer support team + customer service representatives. A powerful dashboard that gives us options to play around especially with push notifications for different platforms - Web, Android, and iOS. Useful features - for example: Key metrics configuration, segmentation, campaign groupings, analytics, events logging, integration validation, easy role/permission settings.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
Delay in recognizing or profiling users (sometimes logged-in users is detected as guest) - although this seems quite inevitable at most cases, limitation to export details of each push notification campaign, specific features that sometimes are not flexible enough with exact business requirements.

Recommendations to others considering MoEngage:
use all campaign features and consult carefully with your CSR representatives, invite and involve tech team since day 1 as much as possible to get directly into the problem and how the team can solve it in the fastest way.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
Enabling Push Notifications for app users (Android + iOS). More tractions and activations. A lot of indirect benefits that are driven by engaging our app users which we never able to do before we integrated MoEngage with both our Android + iOS apps. By sending different push notification we learn new things every day.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
The platform is very user-friendly and it's easy to navigate and create campaigns ourselves. We're able to automate and track campaigns easily using the platform.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
Since we're using Google Analytics a lot for analysis, it would be useful for us to have utm links added automatically. But in Moengage, we have to manually add the utm for all the campaigns.

all_reviews.review_title: My experiences with MoEngage
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
The customization available and control over the minute details which is usually templated. The level of custom use-cases we are able to achieve using this tool is vast and at the same time very useful in making the communications very contextual and personalized.
The Customer Success team is very active in making sure we achieve our use-case. They will help you along the way in making sure that we are on the right path. At the same time, the quarterly reviews with them give an idea and help you understand what works and what does not.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
The campaign setup is a bit lengthier. It takes quite some time to set it up. Another thing is that features are not universal. For example, Sherpa is not available across all channels. This causes issues while setting up similar campaigns across all channels.

Recommendations to others considering MoEngage:
Amazing support team. Tools are always evolving and the best part with MoEngage is that they are continuously in touch with you to make sure that they build whatever is required.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are currently trying to create the Re-Marketing funnel optimization using the automations by making sure all the channels are inter-linked. This has helped in optimizing costs across channels for our re-marketing costs but at the same time, we have been able to make sure a user is not bombarded with Ads or communications which helps in making sure the user journey is very seamless.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
I love the dashboard, it's really helpful and contain so many on point information. The UX also good, I have no difficulty while use it.
What i really love more is their fast response support. I'm a tech guy, so I have one or two questions and not very good implementation when using MoEngage, but they really helpful, a very fast response support and it makes me comfortable to have collaboration with MoEngage.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
I might not like the documentation on how to implement the SDK. I'm using hybrid, and the documentation is not really helpful. But lately they working more on the documentation, so it's pretty clear now. I respect their effort on making engineer comfortable when implement MoEngage.

There are many things you can do with MoEngage. I really love how they handle push notification, it's easy to use and the analytics view is just perfect. I really recommend you to use this if you have a target to grow your product. The dashboard is really easy to use, and there is a team to assist you, and they're really reliable. I'm a very happy customer, they really doing good in assisting, technical, advices, and strategic.

MoEngage help me to have a really easy access to do push notification, analytics, user  acquisition in only one place. It's really good tools to communicate our product to the user. Now, targeting audience and creating strategy for growth team is easier than ever before.

all_reviews.review_title: Messaging made right!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
Very user-friendly interface 2. Much convenient (Basis my experience with previous engagement tool) 3. Can send engagement campaigns to multiple platforms all in one go. 4. The reporting structure is very well designed. Had helped me a lot in terms of preparing engagement reports. 5. Analytics provides deep insights basis which the task of optimising campaigns, selecting segments becomes less hectic.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
Not at all mobile friendly. 2. Frequently takes time to load. (Homepage & even campaigns)

Recommendations to others considering MoEngage:
Personalisation is key in digital marketing and the level of depth of the technical capabilities the Moengage platform offers has been critical in our cross-channel activities.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
We selected Moengage as the expertise they could provide in the digital sphere really drew us. Their product innovation is second to none - they aren't just players in notifications, they are thought leaders. Their support and knowledge they provide, from our client manager to the free webinars they provide to get the most of the tools, are second to none. We look forward to many more years working together and growing on the impressive results we've achieved to date

all_reviews.review_title: Good to help jumpstart but unable to scale and grow along (especially on more complex issues)
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
MoEngage provides a good start for standard use cases but when trying to go deeper to integrate more complex use cases, MoEngage tends to stutter and fail to deliver the use cases. The response rate of the service is also relatively slow in comparison to others. They tend to provide slow responses and only manage to get things up and running based after of near the agreed timeline (tend to be over most of the time).

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
MoEngage is not good enough in catering complex use cases as the company grows from basic usages to more customized ones. The customization is not even at the level of total customization. Considering the investment and implication of integrating it within the app, I think this is one of the biggest blocking of all.

Recommendations to others considering MoEngage:
If you are looking to solve basic needs quick and fast, MoEngage would be the right solution but if you require something more, MoEngage might not be the best option for your problem

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
basic automation and solving common use cases is quick with MoEngage but need to be wary on the scale and specific use cases that can be solved using MoEngage. Looking back, MoEngage is growing together with the company but they couldn't catch up when we manage to grew faster than MoEngage.

We purely focus on customer onboarding and engagement cycle so that we have greater LTV and more rentention. The platform has largely enabled us to do that.

all_reviews.review_title: Easier interface and excellent reporting
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MoEngage?
The ease of achieving segmentation and  the ability to pass custom fields to the moengage database externally, as well as extracting data using bigquery directly make it really versatile and key to have all the data at your disposal in a matter of few minutes. Cheers!

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
The moengage database could be more readable (field names/table names)

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
Major problems we have solved all thanks to moengage include geofencing which is key to our business (Zoomcar from airport)
Others include complex segmentation by integrating calculated fields with Moengage and scheduling of reoccurring campaigns.

all_reviews.review_title: All in one user engagement tool!
all_reviews.review_content:

It has almost everything that is required for user engagement. From notifications to e mailers, SMS to smart triggers it's got everything. Additionally, the ease of using (Planning + Execution) is way better.

What do you dislike about MoEngage?
Takes lot of time to load in Google Chrome. Nothing else so far.

Recommendations to others considering MoEngage:
Now reach millions in just few clicks. Moengage is here.

What problems is MoEngage solving and how is that benefiting you?
Anything and everything that is related to user engagement. Our business basically aims at entertaining the masses on regular basis. Moengage plays a very important role in doing so. So far I have used push notification, emailers, in-app nativ's and flow.
